publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2427 Mrs Mary Mulligan:Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate—That the Parliament congratulates Home Aid in Bathgate, West Lothian, on its contribution to furniture recycling; notes that redistribution of furniture helps both the environment and those who find it difficult to furnish their homes, and congratulates Home Aid on its innovative partnership with Oregon in the United States of America for recycling furniture beyond Scotland.
S2M-2427 Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate (lodged on 11 February 2005) Sarah Boyack*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-2427 Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate (lodged on 11 February 2005) Colin Fox*

*S2M-2427*#* Mrs Mary Mulligan: Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate—That the Parliament congratulates Home Aid in Bathgate, West Lothian, on its contribution to furniture recycling; notes that redistribution of furniture helps both the environment and those who find it difficult to furnish their homes, and congratulates Home Aid on its innovative partnership with Oregon in the United States of America for recycling furniture beyond Scotland. Supported by: Christine May* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-2427# Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate (lodged on 11 February 2005) Scott Barrie*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-2427# Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate (lodged on 11 February 2005) Trish Godman*
S2M-2427# Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate (lodged on 11 February 2005) Dr Elaine Murray*
S2M-2427 #Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate (lodged on 11 February 2005) Cathy Peattie*

S2M-2427 #Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate (lodged on 11 February 2005) Bristow Muldoon*, Bill Butler*, Richard Baker*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Maureen Macmillan*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Jackie Baillie*
S2M-2427# Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate (lodged on 11 February 2005) Karen Gillon*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2427# Congratulations to Home Aid, Bathgate (lodged on 11 February 2005) Mr Jamie Stone* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
